comment: Not working for me. The OsmAnd help pages are totally useless unless you're a digital mapping nerd. OsmAnd needs to decide whether they're providing a service for people who use maps, or providing a sandpit for people who want to make maps.

title: Cannot display
comment: No contour lines or shading display on my tablet. Maybe it works on a phone, but definitely doesn't on a tablet.

title: Good
comment: But contours won't display over 5 mile scale... This is a problem for marine use when identifying landmarks from a boat.

It works but in the product's description should mention that this is not a feature that "displays" your charts in a different way to show contour lines / relief, but it depends on different chart files you have to download in addition to have downloaded the Contour Line feature and enable it. This increases even more the memory use on your phone: 1) the extra plugin, 2) again all your charts have to be downloaded but now as contour lines instead of the regular vectorial maps that you may have already downloaded. It works but the installation process is not presented properly in advance and its use requests do download a lot more stuff.  Osmand produces nice apps but together with all these extra adds on, more and more downloads, the size in my phone as reached almost 2GB by now. I guess is what we get by using off line features...

Very useful, working plugin, although there are some minor issues I see: in some regions the contour line data is not perfect, the lines sometimes are not touching, there are missing segments; zooming back makes the rendering slow - should not render all the lines in this case; the numbers on curvy lines are distorted on the corners. Keep up the good work! Thx.
Works once you download the contour lines pack

The installation is a little tricky but it’s worth persevering. 1. Install the plugin either from here or use the Settings menu in OSMAnd. Once it is installed, exit OSMAnd and restart your device for good measure. 2. Follow the steps below to add the contour and hill shading files:-  1. Press the Menu button with (4 squares)  in the lower left corner 2. Now press the Settings button (cog wheel) in the top right corner 3. Select Manage Map Tiles 4. Select All Downloads 5. The top of the screen has a pull down list labelled with Regular Maps. Change this to Contour Lines 6. Select the contours to download.  Go back into the downloads and select Hill shade Cover from the pull down list to download hill shade In OSMAND, you can use the menu button to switch between cycling and walking modes and assign different layers to each mode. I’ve added contours and hill shading to cycling and walking modes as I find the extra information useful but I prefer to keep the driving mode screen clearer.

title: No auto download, poor shading
comment: The contours and shading did not download and install automatically on my Sony Xperia Z3 compact. Once installed manually, shading was patchy and uneven across the map in the Leith Hill area of the UK.

It's not obvious how to further enable to download contours after getting this plugin. However, after it's done, the contours are very helpful for using the map with topography. Very useful for hiking and cycling.

Download instructions: Settings⇒Manage Map Files ⇒ select "ALL DOWNLOADS" and then a pull down will appear at the top with "Regular maps" showing. In the pull down select "Contour lines".  Hill shade is in that same pull down if you want those too.

title: Did not work
comment: There is no comprehensive description of how to make OmsAnd+ show the contours / hillshades. Unless I am missing something, the app does not work. Refunded.
Wrecks sdcard. Utter rubbish.

title: Does not work with osmand v 2.x
comment: This app and the instruction do not work with the new version of osmand v2.x

title: Don't forget to download the contours and shading tile files to make this work.
comment: Got the paid version of Osmand and everything works smoothly now. Finally, my favorite fishing lake hike location shows up with contours and shading on my Tracfone LG L41C. Can't wait for the snow to clear so I can track every step of the way. This app is so cool. Kudos to the developers.

title: Doesn't seem to work
comment: Maybe it's just my settings or uncovered area, but authors should note that.

Have you downloaded the section of Contour maps you need? You can do that in the downloads menu. Then enable the plugin and restart your app. Make sure to switch from Regular maps before getting the maps you need.

title: This is not working for me
comment: Ive paid for and downloaded the contour lines plug in, selected 'enable' of the contour lines plug in in settings and ticked the box for 'hillshade layer' in the configure map option. Nothing nada. Whats happening please?
You have to download the section of map you need (make sure to check Contour lines instead of Regular maps in the downloads menu), then restart the app.

title: Please be aware that you have to download contour lines seperately
comment: Description on how to activate contour lines does not fit to current version of OsmAnd. Activation requires three steps, there is no way to see where you failed/ passed. When you got successfully through the process the feature is great.

title: Spotty Plugin
comment: The original app (OSMAND+) is great and as good a front end for this open source map base as anybody could want, but the contour lines plugin is at best, spotty and only intermitantly usable.  Hopefully futher user feedback and develpment will improve it.  I'm giving it a 3 for potential not performance.

title: How to get contour lines to show up?
comment: There is no clear way to get contour lines to show on map

title: No contours
comment: After install and enabling countours, no contours were shown. I tried setting all the zoom level options, zooming in and out, restarting the app, etc. No luck

title: Contour maps will neither install or download in OSMAnd 2
comment: Plugin does not install correctly

title: Very useful plugin
comment: This plugin is worth the money. What could be added is to have some help within the app/plugin for getting the contour maps and hillshade layer. Now I had to return to the Play store for that help a couple of times.
Please fix contour lines for tablets

title: Difficult to display the contour lines
comment: The instructions in the app for obtaining them are no longer current.

title: Why no contour lines for USA Alaska?
comment: I would have rated it 5 stars if only it included contour lines for Alaska! There's contour lines for all of Canada,  why not their neighbors in Alaska?  British Columbia is so mountainous it's broken down into four sections. Surely the same could be done to Alaska!
User friendly
Needs settings for and color.

title: Great plugin
comment: Since some remote places are not covered by contours files (e.g. Alaska) manual for building custom contours files should be provided for users who want to make them by themselves. I will give 5 stars when this will be fixed.

title: Mandatory extension
comment: Many thanks! This is mandatory extension to flat osmand maps for hikers, bikers, mountaineers... Idea is great but implementation not completed. Please take into account following issues: * hillshade layer tiles don't match neighbour tiles seamlessly * would be nice to have user control of hillshade layer opacity * contour lines don't match next tile seamlessly * contour lines density needs to be dependent on zoom * high precipices should be somehow represented on contour layer

title: Just okay
comment: I really enjoy osmand but the contours and numbers are really hard to see,espeacily against the forest service green, which is where i use the most.  Please increase contrast or have user adjustment plus increase size of elevation numbers.
Needs settings for thickness and color!

title: Good feature
comment: Great for hiking. Thx

title: Excellent
comment: Excellent
Thank you for your support! :)

title: need some controls / settings
comment: Hillshade is ok, with a control to set visibility.  But contour lines only come in at zoom level 13.  That's too close for me.  Also contour lines need to be thicker. Can we have controls for both contour thickness and zoom level?  LATER- Have found contour zoom controls in a strange place (the settings in OSMAND  badly need rationalizing) and 11 is probably ok. But still need a setting for contour thickness and/or colour.

title: Just OK.
comment: Organization is poor. It's all about maps.... why is getting to the map download page buried so far in the menus?  Maybe the price will be worth it off I do more traveling in retirement. Right now I'm not impressed.

title: It doesn't work....
comment: If you have the free version of osmand and have already downloaded 10 maps this won't work.

title: works. downloads are too large.
comment: You have to download an entire country or province;no way to download only the parts you want, so it wastes bandwidth and storage space. Too cluttered as you zoom out; it does not reduce the detail to compensate. Otherwise OK. It's not clear whether this feature is built in to the paid version of OsmAnd+, but I bought the plugin anyway.

title: Very good app
comment: Need to add unpaved to priority routing filter for people who want to take dirt roads.  How do I see which roads are unpaved?  I'm an adventure rider

title: Great add-on
comment: It makes the app even more complete for hiking and mountain biking. Absolutely great!

title: Best offline navigation
comment: Does what it says. Fantastic to see Free Software for this task. Occasionally some odd routing (it didn't know I could drive over a swing bridge, probably an OSM bug).
Superb

title: Great again
comment: was great, stopped working on update 1.3. Now great again. All working fine.

title: works good
comment: both contour lines and hillshade :)

title: Not required if you have OsmAnd+
comment: Not required if you have OsmAnd+  Still, quite heavy processing load for the device and the contour lines are space-consuming. One small country could get to 1.9gb (e.g. Romania)

title: Funktionsfähig aber noch nicht ganz ausgereift
comment: Ich war vor allem scharf auf die Relieffunktion (neu dt.: hill shading), die ich aber wahrlich nirgends finde um sie zu aktivieren - auch nicht über eine untergelegte Karte. Sobald das sauber funktioniert und für mich als normal sterblichen auffindbar ist, gibt es 5 Sterne.
